card.name: Aerial Modification
card.text: Enchant creature or Vehicle As long as enchanted permanent is a Vehicle, it's a creature in addition to its other types. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.

card.name: Aeronaut Admiral
card.text: Flying Vehicles you control have flying.

card.name: Aether Inspector
card.text: Vigilance When Aether Inspector enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Whenever Aether Inspector attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

card.name: Aethergeode Miner
card.text: Whenever Aethergeode Miner attacks, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Pay {E}{E}: Exile Aethergeode Miner, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Airdrop Aeronauts
card.text: Flying Revolt — When Airdrop Aeronauts enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, you gain 5 life.

card.name: Alley Evasion
card.text: Choose one — • Target creature you control gets +1/+2 until end of turn. • Return target creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Audacious Infiltrator
card.text: Audacious Infiltrator can't be blocked by artifact creatures.

card.name: Call for Unity
card.text: Revolt — At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, put a unity counter on Call for Unity. Creatures you control get +1/+1 for each unity counter on Call for Unity.

card.name: Caught in the Brights
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block. When a Vehicle you control attacks, exile enchanted creature.

card.name: Consulate Crackdown
card.text: When Consulate Crackdown enters the battlefield, exile all artifacts your opponents control until Consulate Crackdown leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Conviction
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+3. {W}: Return Conviction to its owner's hand.

card.name: Countless Gears Renegade
card.text: Revolt — When Countless Gears Renegade enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

card.name: Dawnfeather Eagle
card.text: Flying When Dawnfeather Eagle enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Deadeye Harpooner
card.text: Revolt — When Deadeye Harpooner enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, destroy target tapped creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Decommission
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Revolt — If a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Deft Dismissal
card.text: Deft Dismissal deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target attacking or blocking creatures.

card.name: Exquisite Archangel
card.text: Flying If you would lose the game, instead exile Exquisite Archangel and your life total becomes equal to your starting life total.

card.name: Felidar Guardian
card.text: When Felidar Guardian enters the battlefield, you may exile another target permanent you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Ghirapur Osprey
card.text: Flying

card.name: Restoration Specialist
card.text: {W}, Sacrifice Restoration Specialist: Return up to one target artifact card and up to one target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Solemn Recruit
card.text: Double strike Revolt — At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Solemn Recruit.

card.name: Sram, Senior Edificer
card.text: Whenever you cast an Aura, Equipment, or Vehicle spell, draw a card.

card.name: Sram's Expertise
card.text: Create three 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens. You may cast a card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Thopter Arrest
card.text: When Thopter Arrest enters the battlefield, exile target artifact or creature an opponent controls until Thopter Arrest leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Aether Swooper
card.text: Flying When Aether Swooper enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Whenever Aether Swooper attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

card.name: Aethertide Whale
card.text: Flying When Aethertide Whale enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E} (six energy counters). Pay {E}{E}{E}{E}: Return Aethertide Whale to its owner's hand.

card.name: Baral, Chief of Compliance
card.text: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Whenever a spell or ability you control counters a spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

card.name: Baral's Expertise
card.text: Return up to three target artifacts and/or creatures to their owners' hands. You may cast a card with converted mana cost 4 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Bastion Inventor
card.text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

card.name: Disallow
card.text: Counter target spell, activated ability, or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

card.name: Dispersal Technician
card.text: When Dispersal Technician enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact to its owner's hand.

card.name: Efficient Construction
card.text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

card.name: Hinterland Drake
card.text: Flying Hinterland Drake can't block artifact creatures.

card.name: Ice Over
card.text: Enchant artifact or creature Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Illusionist's Stratagem
card.text: Exile up to two target creatures you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control. Draw a card.

card.name: Leave in the Dust
card.text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

card.name: Mechanized Production
card.text: Enchant artifact you control At the beginning of your upkeep, create a token that's a copy of enchanted artifact. Then if you control eight or more artifacts with the same name as one another, you win the game.

card.name: Metallic Rebuke
card.text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

card.name: Negate
card.text: Counter target noncreature spell.

card.name: Quicksmith Spy
card.text: When Quicksmith Spy enters the battlefield, target artifact you control gains "{T}: Draw a card" for as long as you control Quicksmith Spy.

card.name: Reverse Engineer
card.text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Draw three cards.

card.name: Salvage Scuttler
card.text: Whenever Salvage Scuttler attacks, return an artifact you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Shielded Aether Thief
card.text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Whenever Shielded Aether Thief blocks, you get {E} (an energy counter). {T}, Pay {E}{E}{E}: Draw a card.

card.name: Shipwreck Moray
card.text: When Shipwreck Moray enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E}{E} (four energy counters). Pay {E}: Shipwreck Moray gets +2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Skyship Plunderer
card.text: Flying Whenever Skyship Plunderer deals combat damage to a player, for each kind of counter on target permanent or player, give that permanent or player another counter of that kind.

card.name: Take into Custody
card.text: Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Trophy Mage
card.text: When Trophy Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 3, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Whir of Invention
card.text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Wind-Kin Raiders
card.text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Flying

card.name: Aether Poisoner
card.text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) When Aether Poisoner enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Whenever Aether Poisoner attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

card.name: Alley Strangler
card.text: Menace

card.name: Battle at the Bridge
card.text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn. You gain X life.

card.name: Cruel Finality
card.text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

card.name: Daring Demolition
card.text: Destroy target creature or Vehicle.

card.name: Defiant Salvager
card.text: Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Defiant Salvager. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Fatal Push
card.text: Destroy target creature if it has converted mana cost 2 or less. Revolt — Destroy that creature if it has converted mana cost 4 or less instead if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

card.name: Fen Hauler
card.text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Fen Hauler can't be blocked by artifact creatures.

card.name: Foundry Hornet
card.text: Flying When Foundry Hornet enters the battlefield, if you control a creature with a +1/+1 counter on it, creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Fourth Bridge Prowler
card.text: When Fourth Bridge Prowler enters the battlefield, you may have target creature get -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Gifted Aetherborn
card.text: Deathtouch, lifelink

card.name: Glint-Sleeve Siphoner
card.text: Menace Whenever Glint-Sleeve Siphoner enters the battlefield or attacks, you get {E} (an energy counter). At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Gonti's Machinations
card.text: Whenever you lose life for the first time each turn, you get {E}. (You get an energy counter. Damage causes loss of life.) Pay {E}{E}, Sacrifice Gonti's Machinations: Each opponent loses 3 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

card.name: Herald of Anguish
card.text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Flying At the beginning of your end step, each opponent discards a card. {1}{B}, Sacrifice an artifact: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Ironclad Revolutionary
card.text: When Ironclad Revolutionary enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on Ironclad Revolutionary and each opponent loses 2 life.

card.name: Midnight Entourage
card.text: Other Aetherborn you control get +1/+1. Whenever Midnight Entourage or another Aetherborn you control dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Night Market Aeronaut
card.text: Flying Revolt — Night Market Aeronaut enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

card.name: Perilous Predicament
card.text: Each opponent sacrifices an artifact creature and a nonartifact creature.

card.name: Renegade's Getaway
card.text: Target permanent gains indestructible until end of turn. Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy a permanent with indestructible, and if it's a creature, it can't be destroyed by damage.)

card.name: Resourceful Return
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If you control an artifact, draw a card.

card.name: Secret Salvage
card.text: Exile target nonland card from your graveyard. Search your library for any number of cards with the same name as that card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Sly Requisitioner
card.text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Whenever a nontoken artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

card.name: Vengeful Rebel
card.text: Revolt — When Vengeful Rebel enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, target creature an opponent controls gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

card.name: Yahenni, Undying Partisan
card.text: Haste Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Yahenni, Undying Partisan. Sacrifice another creature: Yahenni gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Yahenni's Expertise
card.text: All creatures get -3/-3 until end of turn. You may cast a card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

card.text: First strike When Aether Chaser enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Whenever Aether Chaser attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

card.name: Chandra's Revolution
card.text: Chandra's Revolution deals 4 damage to target creature. Tap target land. That land doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.text: Choose one — • Destroy target artifact. • Creatures without flying can't block this turn.

card.name: Frontline Rebel
card.text: Frontline Rebel attacks each combat if able.

card.name: Gremlin Infestation
card.text: Enchant artifact At the beginning of your end step, Gremlin Infestation deals 2 damage to enchanted artifact's controller. When enchanted artifact is put into a graveyard, create a 2/2 red Gremlin creature token.

card.name: Hungry Flames
card.text: Hungry Flames deals 3 damage to target creature and 2 damage to target player.

card.name: Indomitable Creativity
card.text: Destroy X target artifacts and/or creatures. For each permanent destroyed this way, its controller reveals cards from the top of his or her library until an artifact or creature card is revealed and exiles that card. Those players put the exiled cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle their libraries.

card.name: Invigorated Rampage
card.text: Choose one — • Target creature gets +4/+0 and gains trample until end of turn. • Two target creatures each get +2/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Kari Zev, Skyship Raider
card.text: First strike, menace Whenever Kari Zev, Skyship Raider attacks, create a legendary 2/1 red Monkey creature token named Ragavan that's tapped and attacking. Exile that token at end of combat.

card.name: Kari Zev's Expertise
card.text: Gain control of target creature or Vehicle until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. You may cast a card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Lightning Runner
card.text: Double strike, haste Whenever Lightning Runner attacks, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters), then you may pay {E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}. If you pay, untap all creatures you control, and after this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

card.name: Pia's Revolution
card.text: Whenever a nontoken artifact is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return that card to your hand unless target opponent has Pia's Revolution deal 3 damage to him or her.

card.name: Precise Strike
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.text: Destroy X target artifacts. Create X 2/2 red Gremlin creature tokens.

card.text: Permanents you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Monstrous Onslaught
card.text: Monstrous Onslaught deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control as you cast Monstrous Onslaught.

card.text: When Peema Aether-Seer enters the battlefield, you get an amount of {E} (energy counters) equal to the greatest power among creatures you control. Pay {E}{E}{E}: Target creature blocks this turn if able.

card.text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

card.name: Ridgescale Tusker

card.text: Draw cards equal to the greatest power among creatures you control. You may cast a card with converted mana cost 5 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Scrounging Bandar
card.text: Scrounging Bandar enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Scrounging Bandar onto another target creature.

card.text: +2: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all nonland permanent cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. −2: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power. −9: Put five +1/+1 counters on each creature you control and five loyalty counters on each other planeswalker you control.

card.text: Enchant artifact Enchanted artifact is a creature with base power and toughness 5/5 in addition to its other types. When enchanted artifact is put into a graveyard, return that card to its owner's hand.

card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target artifact creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Winding Constrictor
card.text: If one or more counters would be put on an artifact or creature you control, that many plus one of each of those kinds of counters are put on that permanent instead. If you would get one or more counters, you get that many plus one of each of those kinds of counters instead.

card.text: {R}, Sacrifice Implement of Combustion: It deals 1 damage to target player. When Implement of Combustion is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Implement of Examination
card.text: {U}, Sacrifice Implement of Examination: Draw a card. When Implement of Examination is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Implement of Ferocity
card.text: {G}, Sacrifice Implement of Ferocity: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. When Implement of Ferocity is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Implement of Improvement
card.text: {W}, Sacrifice Implement of Improvement: You gain 2 life. When Implement of Improvement is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Implement of Malice
card.text: {B}, Sacrifice Implement of Malice: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. When Implement of Malice is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Inspiring Statuary
card.text: Nonartifact spells you cast have improvise. (Your artifacts can help cast those spells. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)

card.name: Irontread Crusher
card.text: Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Lifecrafter's Bestiary
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1. Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may pay {G}. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Merchant's Dockhand
card.text: {3}{U}, {T}, Tap X untapped artifacts you control: Look at the top X cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Metallic Mimic
card.text: As Metallic Mimic enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Metallic Mimic is the chosen type in addition to its other types. Each other creature you control of the chosen type enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Mobile Garrison
card.text: Whenever Mobile Garrison attacks, untap another target artifact or creature you control. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Night Market Guard
card.text: Night Market Guard can block an additional creature each combat.

card.name: Ornithopter
card.text: Flying

card.name: Pacification Array
card.text: {2}, {T}: Tap target artifact or creature.

card.name: Paradox Engine
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, untap all nonland permanents you control.

card.name: Peacewalker Colossus
card.text: {1}{W}: Another target Vehicle you control becomes an artifact creature until end of turn. Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Planar Bridge
card.text: {8}, {T}: Search your library for a permanent card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Renegade Map
card.text: Renegade Map enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Sacrifice Renegade Map: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Reservoir Walker
card.text: When Reservoir Walker enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life and get {E}{E}{E} (three energy counters).

card.name: Scrap Trawler
card.text: Whenever Scrap Trawler or another artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return to your hand target artifact card in your graveyard with lesser converted mana cost.

card.name: Servo Schematic
card.text: When Servo Schematic enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

card.name: Treasure Keeper
card.text: When Treasure Keeper dies, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card with converted mana cost 3 or less. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put all revealed cards not cast this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Universal Solvent
card.text: {7}, {T}, Sacrifice Universal Solvent: Destroy target permanent.

card.name: Untethered Express
card.text: Trample Whenever Untethered Express attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Verdant Automaton
card.text: {3}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Verdant Automaton.

card.name: Walking Ballista
card.text: Walking Ballista enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. {4}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Walking Ballista. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Walking Ballista: It deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.text: {2}{U}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

card.name: Welder Automaton

card.name: Spire of Industry
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Activate this ability only if you control an artifact.

card.name: Ajani, Valiant Protector
card.text: +2: Put two +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature. +1: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. −11: Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is your life total. That creature gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Inspiring Roar
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Ajani's Comrade
card.text: Trample At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control an Ajani planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Comrade.

card.name: Ajani's Aid
card.text: When Ajani's Aid enters the battlefield, you may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Ajani, Valiant Protector, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it. Sacrifice Ajani's Aid: Prevent all combat damage a creature of your choice would deal this turn.

card.text: Tranquil Expanse enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Tezzeret, Master of Metal
card.text: +1: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal an artifact card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. −3: Target opponent loses life equal to the number of artifacts you control. −8: Gain control of all artifacts and creatures target opponent controls.

card.name: Tezzeret's Betrayal
card.text: Destroy target creature. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Tezzeret, Master of Metal, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

card.name: Pendulum of Patterns
card.text: When Pendulum of Patterns enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life. {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Pendulum of Patterns: Draw a card.

card.text: {T}: Target opponent loses 1 life. If you control a Tezzeret planeswalker, that player loses 3 life instead.
